title: Ticket #5707: Remove excessive NegotiatorLog messages about accounting groups by def
description: The LIGO condor pool at Caltech has thousands of accounting groups, and in every negotiation cycle, we dprint out one line per accounting group per spin at D_ALWAYS, which results in tremendous spurious output. Let's make this D_FULLDEBUG.
check_ins: 2016-Jun-06 15:02   Check-in [48497]: Turn down default accounting group logging negotiator #5707 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
